name: Simple Gmail Chat
description: Removes often-unneeded elements from Gmail chat to increase the number of contacts that can be displayed. Much better if used in combination with Remove Google Top Bar! (worth +1 contact in list)
additional_info: Elements that are removed: - Status messages. You can still see them when you hover your mouse over a contact. - Invisibility alert - Bottom tablist See the screenshots! Updates 2012.07.06 - Fixed the status selector over long user names. 2012.08.06 - Updated to work with the new Gmail chat design recently launched. 2012.09.28 - Fixed: Status message was displayed when the contact was highlighted in the list because a new message was received. It is now hidden.
